DOC.brief_title: Step-Up Intervention Self-Management Fatigue Young Adults Receiving Chemotherapy
DOC.detailed_description: Interventions increase physical activity show relieve fatigue patient receive chemotherapy , study test physical activity intervention improve fatigue young adult receive chemotherapy . This study determine impact physical activity intervention self-management process variable self-efficacy self-regulation relationship physical activity fatigue severity young adult receive chemotherapy .
